wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Byers (born 23 August 1979) is a Scottish footballer, who played in the Scottish Football League for Raith Rovers, Inverness Caledonian Thistle, Montrose, Forfar Athletic and Brechin City. He is currently the manager of Kennoway Star Hearts in the SJFA East Superleague.
